SELECT DATE(o.pay_time) AS date, oi.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, COALESCE(SUM(oi.subtotal), 0) AS amount FROM `order` o JOIN order_item oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN product p ON p.id = oi.product_id WHERE o.status IN ('PENDING_SHIP', 'SHIPPED', 'COMPLETED') AND o.pay_time >= #{start} AND o.pay_time <= #{end} GROUP BY DATE(o.pay_time), oi.product_id, p.name ORDER BY date, oi.product_id
